updates.title: Phoenix / MyGCHR
updates.text: We are currently aware of an issue with MyGCHR where users are unable to access Phoenix tools.

updates.title: Outlook Enterprise Add-On
updates.text: We have received a high volume of tickets regarding the Outlook Enterprise add-on and are investigating the issue.

updates.title: Service Manager Server Maintenance
updates.text: Tonight at 8:30pm, the service manager portal will be unavailable until tomorrow morning at 7am for scheduled maintenance.

updates.title: Outlook in Citrix Issue Resolved
updates.text: Network Services has confirmed that Outlook should function normally in Citrix now. Please submit a ticket if you still are experiencing issues.
